Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

Interface RSGroupableBalancer

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigurationObserver, LoadBalancer, Stoppable
All Known Implementing Classes:
RSGroupBasedLoadBalancer
@Private public interface RSGroupableBalancer extends LoadBalancer
Marker Interface. RSGroups feature will check for a LoadBalancer marked with this Interface before it runs.
